name: Tetrominoes (NonRatedGames)
description:
TETROMINOES Tetrominoes is an old school tetris remake I made with Unity. WebGL Demo

↑ Up Arrow Key: Rotate Shape.

← Left Arrow Key:  Move Shape To Left Side Across The Grid.

→ Right Arrow Key: Move Shape To Right Side Across The Grid.

↓ Down Arrow Key: Will Move The Shape To The Down Side Of The Grid.

Android

The Android Mobile version feaures are:

- Remove Ads by playing the game.
- Leaderboards.
- Achievements.
- Swipe gestures controller.
